XRSessionEvent.summary: The WebXR Device API's XRSessionEvent interface describes an event which indicates the change of the state of an . These events occur, for example, when the session ends or the visibility of its context changes.

XRSessionEventSession.summary:
The read-only interface's
session property indicates which
the event is about.
XRSessionEventSession.value: An object indicating which WebXR session the event refers to.

XRSessionEventXRSessionEvent.summary:
The WebXR Device API's
XRSessionEvent() constructor creates and returns a new
object. These objects represent events announcing
state changes in an representing an augmented or virtual
reality session.
XRSessionEventXRSessionEvent.returns:
A new object representing an object of the
specified type and configured as described by the options parameter.
